game.title: Dragon Slayer
game.objective: Defeat the mighty dragon terrorizing the kingdom
game.description: You've been chosen by the king to slay the dragon which has been causing chaos in our land. You will have to travel through treacherous terrains, conquer fearsome foes before you can face the dragon at the Heart of the volcano.
game.reward: Kingdom's highest honor and 5000 gold coins

task.description: Visit the kingdom's blacksmith to gather necessary weapons and armors.
An undead army guards the way to the dragon's lair. Defeat them to move forward.
Finally, defeat the dragon residing in Heart of the volcano.
